physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a military personnel sitting cross-legged in a room. He is holding a piece of paper in his hand and looking at it. He is wearing only his underpants and his bed is located to his right. Cut-outs of nude women and pin-up models are put up on the wall. The shirt of the military personnel hangs behind him.
